title: Long-Term Constructivist-Based Social Sector Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational social science theories with insufficient practical experience
context.additional_context: A training program for in-service professionals emphasizing social problem-solving competencies, providing an environment where learners can collaborate and collect data using smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can independently perform projects analyzing real-world social issues and constructing solutions at least three times.
Learners can evaluate and improve their practical approaches based on peer feedback at least twice.
Learners acquire critical thinking skills necessary to design community problem-solving scenarios by applying constructivist learning principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
